amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds by HUD to retain any legal counsel who is not an employee of HUD or the Department of Justice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by HUD to retain any legal counsel who is not an employee of HUD or the Department of Justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 249 (Roll no. 284).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
